originalText.text: He is a phenomenal podiatrist! Dr. Abraham is very knowledgeable with an impeccable bedside manner. He is also honest, and provides valuable, affordable care.

text.text: He is a phenomenal podiatrist! Dr. Abraham is very knowledgeable with an impeccable bedside manner. He is also honest, and provides valuable, affordable care.

originalText.text:
I would not recommend this doctor for serious injuries or if you are seeking kind treatment from the office manager.

Had a tricky injury that was mistreated. I will give the doctor credit for following up consistently and being kind. However, I got stuck with a injury that went on for weeks and was very painful due to lack of attention and misdiagnosis.

The office manager was very inpatient and rude. Never once apologized or showed sympathy for the errors made. Probably one of the worst customer service experiences I’ve ever witnessed.

I would not recommend this doctor for serious injuries or if you are seeking kind treatment from the office manager.

Had a tricky injury that was mistreated. I will give the doctor credit for following up consistently and being kind. However, I got stuck with a injury that went on for weeks and was very painful due to lack of attention and misdiagnosis.

The office manager was very inpatient and rude. Never once apologized or showed sympathy for the errors made. Probably one of the worst customer service experiences I’ve ever witnessed.

originalText.text: Dr Abraham is awesome, very interested in any question one has. He is gentle on feet, pain free and has a nice smile as he attends to your feet. Nice convenient office with ,M14 bus in front, so convenient it is a real pleasure to visit his practice.

text.text: Dr Abraham is awesome, very interested in any question one has. He is gentle on feet, pain free and has a nice smile as he attends to your feet. Nice convenient office with ,M14 bus in front, so convenient it is a real pleasure to visit his practice.

originalText.text:
I was there last year. I wasn't sure what to expect from a podiatrist. Having heard a lot of horror stories, I  tired to avoid it for the pain issue I was having. I literally felt I was dying.

Dr. Steve was funny. He calmed me down. He did a thorough examination and was able to diagnosis my issue. I wasn't sure what to make of it. He told me the solution was simple - all I had to choose was the price issue - cheap or expensive. I asked for his opinion. He suggested the cheapest solution. Both solution works very well. It just depended on how deep my pockets were and how much ego I had.

By the way, he told me the pros and cons of each. He gave me the solution 10 minutes later. I literally walked out of his office bouncing on air. My pain went away. I tell you with the pain before - I was imagining the worst. Now, I am floating on air.

I took most of his advice and have been working on my leg muscles.
If you are expecting a very up scaled practice, he is not the one to go to. I found him to be very honest and ethical.  His practice can use a new coat of shiny paint and some additional lights, but he cetainly knows his stuff.

Dr. Steve - thank again. I have been meaning to come by and buy you and your staff lunch.

originalText.text: Met Dr.Abraham today for a quick consult for which he made time in his busy schedule to see me. Very thoughtful and wonderful advise for treating my problem. I will recommend him to anyone needing a podiatrist.
